Table of Contents

Namespace NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models

Classes

Article

Represents a single entry (article/item) from an RSS, Atom or JSON Feed source. Stores metadata, content, user interaction state and processing flags. Designed for efficient querying and low memory usage on low-end hardware.

ArticleTag

Join entity for the many-to-many relationship between Article and Tag. Stores metadata about when and how each tag was applied (user, rule, system). Optimized for fast lookups by article, tag, rule or application source.

Category

Represents a category (folder/group) for organizing subscribed feeds. Supports hierarchical nesting via parent-child relationships and custom sorting. Optimized for fast tree traversal, sorting and filtering in UI components.

Feed

Represents a subscribed RSS/Atom/JSON Feed source. Stores metadata, synchronization state, health indicators, caching info and retention rules. Optimized for efficient polling, conditional GET and low-bandwidth sync on constrained devices.

NotificationLog

Audit log for all notifications sent to the user. Tracks delivery, interaction, and effectiveness metrics for analytics and debugging.

PreferenceDefaults

Default values for all preferences. Provides a centralized source of truth for default configurations.

PreferenceHelper

Helper methods for working with application preferences. Provides categorization for UI display, default value resolution, and comprehensive validation for all preference types.

PreferenceKeys

Complete preference keys for all application features. Provides centralized key management to prevent typos and ensure consistency.

Rule

Represents a business rule for automated article processing. Supports complex conditions, multiple actions, and scope-based filtering.

RuleCondition

Represents an individual condition within a rule. Allows building complex logical expressions with multiple criteria.

SyncError

Records a synchronization error.

SyncState

Represents the overall synchronization state.

SyncStatistics

Aggregated sync statistics.

SyncTaskConfig

Configuration for a synchronization task.

SyncTaskExecution

Records a single execution of a sync task.

Tag

Represents a user-defined tag for categorizing and organizing articles. Tags are many-to-many with Articles via the ArticleTag join entity.

UserPreferences

Represents a single user preference stored in the database. Implements INotifyPropertyChanged to support two-way data binding in UI layers.

Enums

PreferenceType

Enum representing the data type of a preference. Used by UI to render appropriate input controls.

RuleHealthStatus

Health status for rules based on recent activity.
